abstract: Heaviest fighting in years between Armenia and Azerbaijan breaks out in Armenian separatist enclave of Nagorno-Karabakh, threatening end of 1994 truce.

headline.main: Fighting Between Azerbaijan and Armenia Flares Up in Nagorno-Karabakh

snippet: The heaviest fighting in years broke out in the Armenian separatist enclave, involving tanks, artillery and aircraft.
lead_paragraph: The heaviest fighting in years broke out in the Armenian separatist enclave, involving tanks, artillery and aircraft.
